Today, Dan and Jordan forget that it's their 700th episode, so they just do a normal show, covering a day where Alex is in a great mood because the Georgia Guidestones had been bombed the night before.

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/7/7/episode-700-july-6-2022 Episode #700: July 6, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex talks a ton about how [https://www.cbsnews.com/news/georgia-guidestones-blown-up-explosion/ the Georgia Guidestones got blown up]
*Alex asserts that the English slab of the Guidestones was bombed, but that is not correct. It was the slab that featured print in Hebrew and Arabic ([https://georgiarecorder.com/2022/07/07/failed-gop-governor-candidate-cheers-satanic-georgia-guidestones-blast/ resources showing the bombed slab], comparisons can be made to [https://placeandsee.com/wiki/georgia-guidestones the slabs next to it], which features [https://www.newspapers.com/clip/105132194/georgia-guidestones-associated-press/ Chinese writing on one side and Hindi on the other])
*There is [https://www.newsweek.com/marjorie-taylor-greene-pushes-link-medication-mass-shootings-highland-park-1721631 no currently available evidence] that Robert Crimo was on psych meds, this is just [https://news.yahoo.com/marjorie-taylor-greene-baselessly-claims-143256079.html a claim MTG has been making]
*MTG pretends that there weren't anti-LGBTQ attacks, both [https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2022/06/24/oslo-london-pub-shooting-pride-norway/ carried out] and [https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2022/jun/18/increase-anti-lgbtq-attacks-rightwing-extremist-groups planned], [https://www.washingtonpost.com/national-security/2022/06/17/lgbtq-pride-violence/ during Pride month]
*[https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34102649/ 2021 study] about mass shooters and psychiatric illness
